entry.title: Concealer + Ph Blush
entry.s:vendor: Typsy Beauty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Concealer
Price: 1599.00

Late nights, flawless mornings – meet the Hangover Proof Full Coverage Concealer.

This light-as-air, full-coverage concealer hides dark circles, blemishes, redness, and signs of last night – no creasing, no caking.

Why it's a game-changer:

Full coverage with a natural matte finish

Sweat-proof, water-resistant & crease-proof

Shea Butter-infused for hydration & smooth application

Blurs fine lines, pores & wrinkles effortlessly

XL pillowy doe-foot for easy, precise use

Doubles as a highlighter & contour stick

9 versatile shades made for Indian skin tones

Made in Korea


Say hello to glow – Typsy Beauty’s pH-antastic Colour Adjusting Blush!

India’s first-ever powder tint blush that adapts to your unique pH and moisture levels for a personalized pop of color that lasts up to 8 hours.

Why it’s a must-have:

pH-Adaptive Formula: Custom blush shade tailored to your skin

Powder Tint Tech: Long-wear, vibrant color with a radiant finish

Featherlight Texture: Breathable, zero-powder feel

Easy to Blend: Seamless, natural glow without harsh lines

Brightening Pigments: Instantly freshens your complexion

Oil Control + Hydration: Matte finish with skin-loving comfort

Universal. Weightless. Glow-boosting. Your cheeks, but better.

entry.title: Silk Cushion Blush + Lip Shots
entry.s:vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
Type: Silk Cushion
Price: 1599.00

Introducing the Silk Cushion Collection – India's first cream-liquid face range with a viral cushion-tip applicator for flawless, radiant skin.

Blush it your way: Just dot, blend, and glow with 4 pigment-packed, silky blushes – Bouquet of Roses, Strawberry Champagne, Coral Cascade, and Violet Veil.

Why you’ll love it:

Buildable, blendable & packed with pigment

Cushion-tip for precise, mess-free application

Enriched with Vitamin E & Hyaluronic Acid

Made for Indian skin tones, suits all types

Feather-light, silky formula

100% vegan & cruelty-free

Formulated in Italy

Pro tip: Twist & lock after use!


Say hello to Lip Shots – your mini lipstick must-haves!

Featuring 4 bestselling ON & OFF shades, these 1.2ml minis deliver intense, weightless color with 12-hour smudge-proof wear.

Why you’ll love them:

Liquid matte with one-swipe pigment

Blurs lines with a soft-focus finish

Packed with Raspberry Stem Cells, Cocoa Butter & Hyaluronic Acid

Non-drying, velvety formula that stays comfy

Mini, mess-free & made for on-the-go

Mask-proof, kiss-proof, food-proof

Big color. Tiny tube. All the impact.

Coral Cascade 08 / Lip Shots

Meet the Pout Polish Peptide Lip Treatment Balm – where skincare meets makeup.

This all-in-one balm delivers the hydration of a lip mask, shine of a glaze, and nourishment of a treatment – all in a sleek, pocket-sized tube.

Why you’ll love it:

Peptides + Collagen: Smooth fine lines, plump, and brighten dark lips

8-Hour Hydration: Moisture-lock tech keeps lips soft and dewy

Cooling Metal Tip: Refreshing, mess-free application

Non-sticky Glaze: High-shine finish with zero tackiness

Lightweight & Buildable: Wears like a dream, day or night

Dessert-Inspired Scents: A treat for your lips

Made in Italy. 100% vegan & cruelty-free. For everyone, every day

Meet Typsy Beauty’s Happy Hour Mini Lipsticks – bold color, tiny package, major impact.

These 8 hydrating matte minis deliver rich, flake-proof pigment in a single swipe. Lightweight, comfy, and clutch-sized, they’re perfect for glam on-the-go – from brunch to cocktail hour.

Why you’ll love them:

Soft matte formula – comfy all-day wear

High pigment payoff – no flaking, no bleeding

Luxe, travel-friendly size

Vegan, cruelty-free & paraben-free

Made in Italy

8 universally flattering shades

Small in size, big on style

A combo containing our Silk Cushion Collection in the shade of your choice and the Magic Wand Highlighter Brush. The collection features 4 blushes: Bouquet of Roses, Strawberry Champagne, Coral Cascade, and Violet Veil. 2 Contour: Maple Syrup and Chocolate Drizzle. 2 Highlighter: Dipped in Gold and Diamond Fizz

A range of buildable, blendable cream-liquid face products that are married with a convenient, easy-to-use viral cushion-tip applicator for precise application that leaves you with gorgeous radiance that lasts. The name says it all, as the texture feels smooth like silk, and the shades are designed for Indian skin tones!

Blush: Dot, dot, blend and pop with these pigment-packed blushes that are bound to make you flush –these silky, lightweight, easy-to-blend formulas are universally flattering and add an instant pop of colour. The collection features two blushes: Bouquet of Rose and Strawberry Champagne 

Contour: Contour with unmatched ease: Define and sculpt like a pro with an easy-to-use precise cushion tip, combined with a silky cream-liquid formula. It blends seamlessly into the skin, delivering a natural-looking best liquid contour finish. Maple Syrup is a warm-toned medium brown, designed for light to medium skin tones, catering to the diverse beauty of Indian skin.

Highlighter: Highlighter: Discover the pearl-infused highlighter wands and unlock the secret to a luminous, soft-focus radiance. The collection includes two glow-giving highlighters: Dipped in Gold and Diamond Fizz

Magic Wand Highlighter Brush: this brush works equally well with other powder formulas. Featuring densely packed vegan bristles, this brush easily picks up and blends out pigments, whilst providing precise application on specific areas of the face with a weightless finish. Apply using small touches to your cheekbones, brow bone and upper lip.

entry.title: Hangover Proof Concealer + Dip & Dab Blender
entry.s:vendor: Typsy Beauty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Concealer
Price: 1529.00

A combo containing any shade of the Hangover Proof Concealer + the Dip & Dab Blender

Hangover Proof Concealer: This concealer boasts a long-wear, sweat, and crease-proof formula that provides light-as-air, full coverage. It masterfully hides under-eye circles, acne scars, blemishes, fine lines, pores, and wrinkles, while also reducing redness. Enriched with Shea butter, it ensures your look remains flawless all day, without creasing or settling into fine lines or pores. This concealer stands as your resilient beauty ally, promising to keep your appearance impeccable, no matter how the night went.

Specially formulated to flatter Indian skin tones, it comes available in 9 versatile shades and doubles as a fantastic tool for highlighting and contouring.

Dip & Dab Blender: Elevate your makeup game to a flawless, celebrity-like finish in seconds with the Dip & Dab beauty blender. This innovative makeup beauty blender offers the best of both worlds through its dual texture design; featuring a unique foam on one side for blending and a silicone surface on the other for application. Plus, its flat side is meticulously engineered to contour to the unique angles and curves of your face seamlessly.

Dip: Use the silicone side of this beauty blender sponge to apply liquids and creams effortlessly. Thanks to its non-porous nature, it ensures minimal product wastage by preventing absorption unlike regular foam blenders, delivering higher coverage.

Dab: When you’re ready to blend, flip over to the sponge side to achieve a seamless and airbrushed finish. The soft, mini beauty blender texture is perfect for tapping your way to that desired flawless finish.

entry.s:vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
Type: Silk Cushion
Price: 1899.00

The two hottest selling products from Typsy Beauty’s iconic silk cushion range come together to create the most versatile face products. The contour wand makes face sculpting a breeze with its innovative silk cushion tip applicator to give a strong chiseled look to cheek  bones and jaw lines, whilst the blush wand can be used to add a pop of radiant colour to the apples of the cheeks. The set comes in a beautiful box that that’s ideal for gifting.  

The set contents: 

• Silk Cushion Blush, Bouquet of Roses 02 (5ml): A buildable, blendable cream blush with a convenient, easy-to-use viral cushion-tip applicator for precise application and silky texture. Just dot and blend this lightweight pigment-packed blush onto the high points of the cheeks for lasting radiance.  

• Silk Cushion Blush, Maple Syrup 05 (5ml): A blendable cream-based contour wand with a convenient cushion tip applicator to easily chisel and scult the face. Ideal for contouring cheek bones, nose and jawlines.  Just dot and blend this lightweight pigment-packed contour to the areas where desired.

entry.title: pH-antastic Colour Adjusting Blush
entry.s:vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
Type: Blush
Price: 899.00

Introducing the Typsy Beauty's pH-antastic Colour Adjusting Blush – India's first Powder tint blush is here. This truly innovative product adapts to your skin's unique pH and moisture levels, delivering a custom glow, just for you. With its ultra-fine, finely milled texture, the blush blends effortlessly, giving you a fresh, radiant finish that lasts up to 8 hours. Lightweight and breathable, it feels like a second skin, offering a flawless, filter-like effect that’s universally flattering and perfect for all skin tones.

What Makes It So Good:
  • pH-Adaptive Formula: Reacts to your skin’s unique pH and moisture level, creating a blush shade tailored just for you
  • Powder Tint Technology: India's first powder tint blush that offers long-lasting color that stays vibrant for up to 8 hours, giving you a flawless, fresh glow throughout the day
  • Soft, Featherlight Texture: Ultra-fine particles ensure a breathable, lightweight feel with a “zero-powder” sensation, making it perfect for all-day wear
  • Easy to Blend & Layer: The finely milled powder blends effortlessly into your skin, creating a natural, seamless finish without harsh lines
  • Brightening Mineral Pigments: Adds a subtle radiance, enhancing your complexion with a fresh, natural glow
  • Oil Control: Provides a matte finish without shine, giving you a smooth, balanced look that lasts all day
  • Moisturizing & Skin Conditioning: Infused with nourishing ingredients, this blush feels hydrating and comfortable on your skin

100% Vegan & Cruelty-free.

Morning afters should never dampen your glow. Whether you're looking to disguise under-eye bags, blemishes, redness, or signs of the previous night's escapades, keep your secret concealed with the Hangover Proof Full Coverage Concealer.

This full coverage concealer boasts a long-wear, sweat, and crease-proof formula that provides  light-as-air, full coverage. It masterfully hides under-eye circles, acne scars, blemishes, fine lines, pores, and wrinkles, while also reducing redness. Enriched with Shea butter, it ensures your look remains flawless all day, without creasing or settling into fine lines or pores. This concealer stands as your resilient beauty ally, promising to keep your appearance impeccable, no matter how the night went.

Whether you need a full-coverage concealer for mature skin, a water-based formula, or the best option for oily or dry skin, the Hangover Proof Concealer has you covered. Its hydrating formula makes it perfect for dry skin, while its versatility shines as an ideal concealer stick. Embrace flawless skin every day with this exceptional multitasker.

Specially formulated to flatter Indian skin tones, it comes available in 9 versatile shades and doubles as a fantastic tool for highlighting and contouring.

Why is it special:

• Full-coverage formula with natural matte finish
• Infused with Shea Butter
• Sweat, water resistant and crease-proof formula that won't cake or settle
• Helps smooth & blur appearance of fine lines, pores & wrinkles
